mapper.select: select psid,psname,tname,notes from productseries ps left join producttype pt on ps.tid=pt.tid order by psid desc
select psid,psname,tid,notes from productseries where psid = #{psid} order by psid desc
mapper.update: update productseries set psname = #{psname},tid = #{tid},notes = #{notes} where psid = #{psid}
